name: Metal-Archives / Encyclopaedia Metallum (White)
description:
White style for the very dark Encyclopedia Metallum.  This style makes readability very easy with vista's Calibri font, as well as the wonderful white, red, and black styling.

Features:
- Calibri font
- White background for each page, table data, and paragraph
- Black background Red text for headings (reverse of screenshot... new screen to come soon)
- Bold table headings
- Extra-large band name headings on specific band's page
- Light overall look

Changelog:
1.0.0.1:
+ Fixed all text on the message board and the forum
+ Now all text is visible and readable!
